AT.name: Alien on the run
AT.description: nintendolife.com: „Great - 8/10“ „With intuitive controls and quick portable-friendly stages, Alien on the Run is a title you'll have trouble putting down.” Das Alien Delude ging seinen üblichen Alien-mäßigen Geschäften auf einem fernen Planeten nach, als er plötzlich von einem UFO in die Tiefen des Weltraums entführt wurde. Seinen Heimatplaneten schmerzlich vermissend startet er die Flucht... Schlüpfe in die Rolle von Delude und bahne dir bei seiner tragisch-komischen Flucht mit kuriosen Alien-Gerätschaften den Weg durch die ultraschnellen Levels. Nutze Delude‘s „Fever Action“: schliddere in den Traktorstrahl und setze ihn im richtigen Augenblick außer Gefecht, um nicht aufgesogen und erneut in die Tiefen des UFOs verschleppt zu werden. Stürze dich in das schräge Abenteuer mit dem stets aufgeregten Delude und bezwinge das mit Fallen übersäte UFO. - Comic Escape Action im Alien-Style! - Überwinde 17 verschiedene UFO-Zonen! - Unzählige „Fever Action“-Posen werden dich überraschen! - Erlebe etliche bizarre Alien-Geräte!

AU.name: Alien on the run
AU.description: nintendolife.com: „Great - 8/10“ „With intuitive controls and quick portable-friendly stages, Alien on the Run is a title you'll have trouble putting down.” Delude was an alien on a faraway planet doing his usual alien-like business when all of a sudden a UFO whisks him off into outer space. Desperate to get back to his own planet he begins his escape from the UFO where he is being held captive. Take control of Delude in his comical great escape, avoiding the tractor beams that patrol the ship and making use of strange alien devices! Take down the tractor beams with Delude's hilarious "Fever Action" by diving into them and quickly pulling off a take-down move. Make use of the weird and wonderful alien devices such as giant rolling wheels, punch bags and mechanical launch arms! Find a way through each area of the UFO littered with traps including roundabouts, speedwalkways and punch boxes as you race against the clock to reach the exit before the time runs out! - Comical escape action, alien style! - Escape from 17 different zones of the UFO! - Enjoy countless Fever Action poses! - Experience lots of bizarre alien devices!

BG.name: Alien on the run

BE.name: Alien on the run
BE.description: nintendolife.com: „Great - 8/10“ „With intuitive controls and quick portable-friendly stages, Alien on the Run is a title you'll have trouble putting down.” Delude était un extraterrestre d'une planète lointaine, faisant ses petites choses habituelles lorsque tout à coup, un ovni le propulse dans l'espace intersidéral. Désespéré de retourner sur sa planète natale, il commence son évasion de l'ovni où il est maintenu captif. Détruisez les rayons tracteurs avec l'hilarante “Action Fièvre” de Delude en plongeant dans ceux-ci pour rapidement effectuer une technique de renversement. Utilisez les étranges et merveilleux appareils extraterrestres comme les roues géantes, les sacs de boxe et les bras mécaniques à projection ! Trouvez votre chemin à travers chaque zone de l'ovni jonché de pièges, incluant des ronds-points, des allées rapides et des boîtes à coups de poing pendant que vous coursez contre la montre pour atteindre la sortie. - Action d'évasion humoristique, façon extraterrestre ! - Évadez-vous de 17 différentes zones de l'ovni ! - Appréciez une multitude de poses Action Fièvre ! - Expérimentez une tonne d'étrange dispositifs extraterrestres !

ES.name: Alien on the run
ES.description: nintendolife.com: „Great - 8/10“ „With intuitive controls and quick portable-friendly stages, Alien on the Run is a title you'll have trouble putting down.” Delude era un alien de un planeta lejano que estaba encargándose de sus asuntos de alienígena cuando de pronto un OVNI lo llevó al espacio exterior. Desesperado por volver a su planeta, empieza su fuga del OVNI donde está cautivo. Controla a Delude en su cómica huida, evitando los rayos abductores que vigilan la nave y usando extraños dispositivos alienígenas. Derriba los rayos abductores con la chistosa Acción Febril de Delude metiéndote en ellos y haciendo un rápido movimiento de derribo. ¡Utiliza raros dispositivos alien como ruedas gigantes, sacos de box y brazos mecánicos! ¡Busca un camino a través de cada zona del OVNI lleno de trampas, incluidas rotondas, rampas mecánicas y teclados numéricos mientras vas a contrarreloj para alcanzar la salida antes de que se acabe el tiempo! - Acción de huida cómica, ¡al estilo alien! - ¡Escapa de 17 zonas diferentes del OVNI! - ¡Disfruta de numerosas Acciones Febriles! - ¡Experimenta con locos aparatos alien!

PT.name: Alien on the run
PT.description: nintendolife.com: „Great - 8/10“ „With intuitive controls and quick portable-friendly stages, Alien on the Run is a title you'll have trouble putting down.” Delude era um E.T. de um planeta distante que levava sua vida de E.T. normalmente, quando de repente um OVNI o capturou e o levou para o espaço. Desesperado para voltar para casa, ele tenta fugir do OVNI onde está sendo mantido como refém. Controle Delude nesta fuga cômica, evitando os raios tratores do OVNI e utilizando estranhos dispositivos alienígenas! Combata os raios tratores com a hilária Ação Febril de Delude, mergulhando nos mesmos e dando um golpe de derrubada. Utilize dispositivos estranhos e fantásticos como rodas rolantes gigantes, sacos de pancada e braços mecânicos! Passe por cada uma das áreas do OVNI, todas cheias de armadilhas, incluindo rotatórias e esteiras rolantes, enquanto você corre contra o relógio para chegar à saída antes que o tempo acabe! - Ação cômica de fuga, estilo alienígena! - Fuja de 17 zonas do OVNI diferentes! - Divirta-se com incontáveis poses da Ação Febril! - Experimente vários dispositivos alienígenas bizarros!

RU.name: Alien on the run
RU.description: nintendolife.com: „Great - 8/10“ „With intuitive controls and quick portable-friendly stages, Alien on the Run is a title you'll have trouble putting down.” Delude was an alien on a faraway planet doing his usual alien-like business when all of a sudden a UFO whisks him off into outer space. Desperate to get back to his own planet he begins his escape from the UFO where he is being held captive. Take control of Delude in his comical great escape, avoiding the tractor beams that patrol the ship and making use of strange alien devices! Take down the tractor beams with Delude's hilarious "Fever Action" by diving into them and quickly pulling off a take-down move. Make use of the weird and wonderful alien devices such as giant rolling wheels, punch bags and mechanical launch arms! Find a way through each area of the UFO littered with traps including roundabouts, speedwalkways and punch boxes as you race against the clock to reach the exit before the time runs out! - Comical escape action, alien style! - Escape from 17 different zones of the UFO! - Enjoy countless Fever Action poses! - Experience lots of bizarre alien devices!
